it.softsolutions.bestx.api

Class BestxProtocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.softsolutions.bestx.api.BestxProtocol

  • public class BestxProtocol
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the API for all the commands that the GUI can send to BestX! engine. The command is allowed if and only if the order is in a status allowing the operation. To see if the command is allowed , please refer to the column Actions in the TabHistoryOrdini DB table As a general rule, bestx engine accepts some of the commands
    Author:
    anna.cochetti

    • Method Detail

      • sendAcceptOrderCommand

        public void sendAcceptOrderCommand(java.lang.String orderNumber,
                          java.lang.String comment)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Send an order acceptance command to bestx engine
        Parameters:
        orderNumber - the bestx order number
        comment - any comment, possibly an empty string, required for this operation
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when unable to send the requested command

      • sendManuallyExecuteCareOrderCommand

        public void sendManuallyExecuteCareOrderCommand(java.lang.String orderNumber,
                                       java.lang.String comment,
                                       java.lang.String price,
                                       java.lang.String qty,
                                       java.lang.String market,
                                       java.lang.String dealer,
                                       java.lang.String refPrice)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Send a manually order execute command to bestx engine
        Parameters:
        orderNumber - the bestx order number
        comment - any comment, possibly an empty string, required for this operation
        price - the execution price
        qty - the executed quantity
        market - the execution platform/market. Must be one of the values acceptable in the installation
        dealer - the counterpart bestx code. Must be one of the market makers accepted in the installation
        refPrice - the reference price in the market (i.e. the best price in the bestx book)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when unable to send the requested command

      • sendAcceptOrderSettlementDateCommand

        public void sendAcceptOrderSettlementDateCommand(java.lang.String orderNumber)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Send a accept order settlement date command to bestx engine. If the order settlement date validation fails this command forces bestx to accept the order settlement date
        Parameters:
        orderNumber - the bestx order number
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when unable to send the requested command

      • sendWaitCancelRequestCommand

        public void sendWaitCancelRequestCommand(java.lang.String orderNumber)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Send a wait order cancel command to bestx engine. When the order is in a state of validation failed the client can request by phone to stop the order waiting for their cancel request
        Parameters:
        orderNumber - the bestx order number
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when unable to send the requested command

      • sendCancelRequestAcceptCommand

        public void sendCancelRequestAcceptCommand(java.lang.String orderNumber,
                                  java.lang.String note)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Send an accept cancel request command to bestx engine. The cancel request has been received and registered by bestx engine
        Parameters:
        orderNumber - the bestx order number
        note - the note to be added to the order notes field
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • sendRestartOrderCareCommand

        public void sendRestartOrderCareCommand(java.lang.String orderNumber)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Send a wait order care activation command to bestx engine. When the order is in a state with no valid prices this command asks bestx engine to automatically perform price discovery in search of liquidity with the preconfigured price discovery strategy
        Parameters:
        orderNumber - the bestx order number
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when unable to send the requested command

      • sendForceTradeWaitCommand

        public void sendForceTradeWaitCommand(java.lang.String orderNumber)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Send a wait for incoming trades (for reconciliation) command to bestx engine. When the order has been manually executed on a platform whose trades are captured by BestX! feeds, use this command to ask Bestx engine to wait for the trades.
        Parameters:
        orderNumber - the bestx order number
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when unable to send the requested command

      • sendForceExecutedCommand

        public void sendForceExecutedCommand(java.lang.String orderNumber)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Send a forced command of change order state to ExecutedState to bestx engine. When the order has is in a technical issue state, this command allows to set the state of the order to the state Executed. This command does not ask bestx engine to send or resend the execution report to the client OMS. To do so use command sendResendExecutionReportCommand.
        Parameters:
        orderNumber - the bestx order number
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when unable to send the requested command

      • sendForceUnexecutedCommand

        public void sendForceUnexecutedCommand(java.lang.String orderNumber)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Send a forced command of change order state to NotExecutedState to bestx engine. When the order has is in a technical issue state, this command allows to set the state of the order to the state NotExecuted. This command does not ask bestx engine to send or resend the execution report to the client OMS. To do so use command sendResendExecutionReportCommand.
        Parameters:
        orderNumber - the bestx order number
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when unable to send the requested command

      • sendForceReceivedCommand

        public void sendForceReceivedCommand(java.lang.String orderNumber)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Send a forced command of change order state to ReceivedState to bestx engine. When the order has is in a technical issue state, this command allows to set the state of the order to the state ReceivedState. This command in fact asks bestx engine to start the validation process on the order
        Parameters:
        orderNumber - the bestx order number
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when unable to send the requested command

      • sendResendExecutionReportCommand

        public void sendResendExecutionReportCommand(java.lang.String orderNumber)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Send a forced command to resend the last execution report to bestx engine. When the order has is in a technical issue state, this command to resend the last execution report to the client OMS and to change the order status accordingly.
        Parameters:
        orderNumber - the bestx order number
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when unable to send the requested command

      • sendToOutsidePolicyCommand

        public void sendToOutsidePolicyCommand(java.lang.String orderNumber)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Send a command to put the order to OutsidePolicyState to bestx engine. This command asks bestx engine to start a new Price Discovery and to put to OutsidePolicyOrderState the order.
        Parameters:
        orderNumber - the bestx order number
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when unable to send the requested command

      • sendRetryExecutionCommand

        public void sendRetryExecutionCommand(java.lang.String orderNumber)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Send a command to ask bestx engine to restart a cycle of automatic execution.
        Parameters:
        orderNumber - the bestx order number
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when unable to send the requested command
